thread.title: BRIEF-Plains All American Pipeline To Proceed With Construction Of Cactus II Pipeline

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Plains All American Pipeline To Proceed With Construction Of Cactus II Pipeline
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - Plains All American Pipeline Lp:
* PLAINS ALL AMERICAN PIPELINE - ‍SUBSIDIARY OF CO SAID IT HAS RECEIVED SUFFICIENT BINDING COMMITMENTS ON ITS INITIAL OPEN SEASON
* PLAINS ALL AMERICAN PIPELINE LP - ‍UNIT OF CO PROCEEDING WITH CONSTRUCTION OF A NEW PIPELINE SYSTEM FROM PERMIAN BASIN TO CORPUS CHRISTI/INGLESIDE AREA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
